mapper.insert: insert find_team_board into(username, title, content, member_max, member_cur, contest_no, team_id) values (#{username}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberMax}, #{memberCur}, #{contestNo}, #{teamId})
mapper.update: update find_team_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, member_max = #{memberMax}, regist_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where username = #{username} and post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from find_team_board where contest_no = #{contestNo}
